name: Today (Jules Truong, Hanniee Tran, melwells, lunasolis, seb)
name_original: Today (Jules Truong, Hanniee Tran, melwells, lunasolis, seb)
description:
How would you break up monotony when any decision you make feels like it is the wrong one? That is the dire question Eve, an adolescent girl, must answer. When every day is identical to the last, and any deviation seems to make the world around her deteriorate, it’s up to her to overcome her intense fear of disappointing others, and instead do what she feels is right.

Play Today! A third person real time adventure that is driven by story with platforming and puzzle elements sprinkled in!
